name: ap_channels

country.description: Two-letter code for the country the AP is operating in.

indoor_outdoor.description: FortiAP indoor/outdoor configuration value (0 for indoor, 1 for outdoor, 2 for default).

GET.summary:
Retrieve the set of channel lists for all possible band/configurations for the given FortiAP platform.
Access Group: wifi

help: Retrieve the set of channel lists for all possible band/configurations for the given FortiAP platform.

outdoor.name: outdoor
outdoor.title: Outdoor Capability
outdoor.description: True when this FortiAP has outdoor working capability.

local.name: local
local.title: Local WiFi Radio
local.description: True when this is the local WiFi radio.

unii4_5ghz_band_country_support.name: unii4_5ghz_band_country_support
unii4_5ghz_band_country_support.title: UNII4 Band Country Support
unii4_5ghz_band_country_support.description: True when the country supports UNII-4 5GHz band channels.

channel_lists.name: channel_lists
channel_lists.title: Platform Band Map
channel_lists.description: List of supported bands for this platform.

response_description: Retrieve the set of channel lists for all possible bands for the given FortiAP platform.

country.name: country
country.summary: Two-letter code for the country the AP is operating in.

indoor_outdoor.name: indoor_outdoor
indoor_outdoor.summary: FortiAP indoor/outdoor configuration value (0 for indoor, 1 for outdoor, 2 for default).
